sourceDesc.p: Converted from a Word document written by mharty

list.item: convert those “,” things to just comma
for MH text files, insert corresponding MH citation

body.p: “Dogs bane ap. tomorrow. I observed yesterday that the vib. Dentatum was very conspicuous & prevalent along the river- as if few other flowers were in bloom- An abundance of galium trifidum in low grounds some smooth- some rough- with 4 leaves or 5 or 6- I do not distinguish the carieties.- Am in doubt whether the Polygonum which I find just opening at the ditch (say tomorrow) is –sagittatum a rank one- (or arifolium – the lobes of the leaves do not spread thus but are 3 or 4 styles & 4 or 5 angled pods- Epilobium prob. Coloratum- yet rather downy-to-morrow- It is worth the while to see the rank weeds which grow here on this cleared & ditched swamp.”
"XVII / 13 February-3 September 1854 / NNPM MA 1302:23 / PE 8, p.201 vol.8; Torrey JVI & JVII, p.#"
